description: Variation of conditions 1,11, 16, 22, 24, 25 of planning permission dated 30th June 2020 (RN 19/09318/FULL) for the demolition of two-storey coach house (72) and building behind retained front facade at 74, for the construction of new five storey building to provide 7 residential flats. Excavation of basement, demolition of existing rear garages and the erection of 2 additional residential dwellings including associated landscaping. NAMELY, to make minor material amendments including; rationalised front landscaping; moving the access to the rear from the southern side of the building to the northern side; adding skylights above the side wings; adding skylights to rear dwellings; making the lower ground floor rear terraces slightly deeper; making the second floor balcony slightly wider; making the ground floor railings wider (though no increase in terrace size); and adding three windows to south and north flank wall and reinstating the existing Juliette balconies to the front elevation.
